UniprotID	Q86XR5
Accession	Q86XR5;Q86XR6
EntryName	PRIMA_HUMAN
ProteinName	Proline-rich membrane anchor 1 (PRiMA)
GeneName	PRIMA1
Length	153
Function	Required to anchor acetylcholinesterase (ACHE) to the basal lamina of the neuromuscular junction and to the membrane of neuronal synapses in brain. Also able to organize ACHE into tetramers (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane; Cell junction; Synapse
